S.FORM: Gaga kska Yacow ka Iraq, 33 00 N, 44 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 438,317 sq km(hangan na o Tg59)(knlbanga dxgal o 437,367 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 950 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 38,146,025 hiyi. Gaga Baghdad ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 14 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Iraq ga wada sugan 18.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 1.90% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 80% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Fuad Masum, pnaah hngkawas2014 idas 7 jiyax 24pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Iraq = Iraq konghekwo pa splawa dha Iraq, wa mniq tuiwil Asia-Nniqan Congtong na konghekwo. Iraq mi tuhunac na Sawuti Arapo, Kuwait, tudaya na Turkey, tuiwil daya na Syria, tunarac na Iran mi tiiwil na Jordan mtlutuc. Nniqan niya Iraq mniq kcka rikisi pa snplawa dha Misoputamiya, kiya ka pusu bay pnyahan sediq uri. Ris Nniqan lnlingay Iraq pa hmrinas 20 knbkiyan kngkawas daw tna niqan sediq mniq hini da. Wa mniq iyax yayung Yohwarati mi yayung Tikoris bbrnux Misoputamiya ka Iraq; knmalu bay dxral niyi pa mndungus bay snpusal mndanga knrudan waya knkla mtqiri klwanan- Waya knkla Sumey, waya knkla Babirun, waya knkla Yasu mi waya knkla Cyaartiya (burah Babirun). Ad. 656 kngkawas cida nniqan dha jiya u wada yahan knnrmux sediq Arupo. Brah niyi cida qbsyaqan bay diyax u, mnkingal drxal Posu tikwo ka hini, binaw kana sotu knkingal cngcweyn pa phyuwan nniqan ddha yayung ryoyu kana, mray so Posu tikwo, Yari Sanda tikwo na Babirun, Sayryoku wangcaw na Sayryosiya, Ansi tikwo, Sasan wangcaw na Taysihung. Kngkawas 762 cida, Harihwa ka thdilan Ansi tikwo, Sasan wangcaw na sotu Taysihong peycyaw ka Pakota. Kndadax hiya cida, ida balay mndungus bay ckcka klwanan Arapo ka Pakota, dhuq kngkawas 1258 cida yahan knnrmux sediq Mongku ka hana mnhdu. Kngkawas 1915 cida, heytay Ingkoku ka knnrmux Iraq, spuda hangan Kworyeyn muda qmlahang dhiya, dhuq kngkawas 1932 cida wada dukuricu ka Iraq, wada spuda Hasimu wangcaw mpqlahang ka qnlhangan pnwaya cyuncu. Kngkawas 1958 idas 7 diyax 14 spuda Abuture Karimu Kasaymu ka pusu na "Pnsliyan mtrawah cyunkwan" pspaux Hasimu wangcaw, phiyu Iraq konghekwo. Kngkawas 1963 idas 2 diyax 8 cida Arupo Husing Sehuytang pspaux Kasaymu, phiyu cngcweyn tnpusu tang dha nanaq, binaw sediq tangway Arihu ka phyuwan soto. Mntna kngkawas cida idas 11, cida u soto Arihu pa wada mbiyax bay qmraq sediq Husingtang, kiya mi wada mquri truma muda ddaun dha ka Husingtang. Kngkawas 1968 idas 7 diyax 17, spuda Ayhamayte Haysang Peykear ka tnpusu na Husingtang cyunkwan citwan mnsupu Abuture Racak Nayihu rrisaw cyunkwan citwan pspaux qbsuran Arihu, Husingtang Dungan ka mangal biyax, dmudul "Pskingal, Mtrawah, Sehuy cuyi" na kangring, Peykear ka phyuwan soto. Kngkawas 1979 idas 7 alaw mnarux malix soto ka Peykear, Syunnipay Satamu Haysan ka mpdudul tang dha mi phyuwan soto. Mniq Satamu ka iyax dmuwi biyax qmlahang cida pquri pqraqil bay Syeypay Musrin muda tucay qmlahang, krinah bay cnbu mi phuqil quri ini pntna qnita seyji niya. Mniq kngkkawas 1980 cida, Satamu ka dyawan Amirika mi mccbu Irang (quri Syeypay Musrin ka pusu bay) dhuq 8 kngkawas ka mccbu Iraq mi Irang. Alaw cida pa mnuda Isran keming ka Irang daw, wada mkingal qnlhangan tmraqil bay Amirika pskngalan kingal ka cngcyaw, mccbu cida ka qnlhangan Iraq mi Irang pa quri so cyunsu u dmkuh Irang mcbu Irang ka Amirika. Kngkawas 1990 cida heytay Iraq pa knrmux Kweyt, pspuruq rmading ka mccbu Haywan, alaw ka ini balay kbiyax ka butay dha Kweyt kiya mi wada ini biyaw yahan knnrmux, pkla kari ka Satamu "ngalan dha kingal sng Iraq ka Kweyt", binaw wada kasi ksngan Ryeynhekwo, spuda Amirika mi Ingkoku ka tnpusu balay mi hbaraw qnlhangan ka prading bbuyu bbnaqi hongpaw singtong, pquri tndxral butay Iraq muda kndadax karac baraw mcbu. Kawas kingal idas 1 cida wada ini baka mi lwaqan Amirika mi knhbrawan butay qnhlangan kndadax Kweyt ka Iraq. So kiya u Amirika ka pusu mi dhbaraw qnhlangan pa wada bsiyaq hari muda bacu quri Iraq niyi. Kngkawas 2003 idas 3 diyax 20 , Amirika pa alaw hmili dmuwi knbeyhing bay ppuniq ddiyun mccbu ka Iraq, pssli pnspuwan heytay mcbu Iraq, so niyi ka ndan u uxay pnuda pnrngawan Ryeynhekwo, wada pspuruq ka mccbu Iraq. Ini kpiya diyax iyax sngayan daw Husingtang cngcweyn u wada ini baka pnspuwan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoku, iyax niyi pa ini uda knbeyki bay kncyukan dha Amirika, hbaraw bay heytay Iraq pa wada tosyang, soto Iraq cida ka Satamu Haysan pa wada sqraq heytay Amirika mi wada pchun ppqilun hoing Iraq ka Haysan. Ini biyaw yahan qmlahang Amirika mi heytay qnlhangan malu pnluban ka Iraq, binaw heytay Amirika pa ini dha sndali ka knbeyhing bay ppuniq ddiyun mccbu na Iraq. Alaw pnsdhuwan Amirika ka singcng cangkwan Poro Bureymo pa wada biqan qpahun seykining uuda Iraq knbeyhing bay singcng cangkwan, ngalan bukung mqlahang Iraq. Kingal kndadax knkingal qnpringan biyax seyji pnspuwan Iraq rinji qmlahang ingkay ka muda pprngaw matas keyngpo mi lxayan smmalu keykaku. Kngkawas 2004 idas 6 diyax 1, Ryeynhekwo, Amirika, Iraq tuturu niyi pa msupu pprngaw snkaul spuda Arawey ka cngri mi phiyu rinji seyhu Iraq. Idas 6 diyax 28, pnspuwan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoku psdhu muway biyax pquri rinji seyhu Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 1 diyax 30, muda beyhing bay seyngkyo ka Iraq. Idas 4 diyax 6, Cyarare Tarapani ka wada mangal kwotu cngcweyn soto. Kngkawas 2006 idas 5 diyax 20, mwaya bay mndungus seyhu babaw mnhdu mccbu mi spuda gikay psdhu smruwa daw psdhuwan. Congri ka Cyawate Mriki. Binaw kongou hwencu mi biyax brah seyhu u iyux kndadar qnlhangan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoku, muda pquri keysacu Iraq mi seyhu ciko mi rulu heytay Amirika mnniq Iraq dmuwi bakudang cnbu dhiya. Syeypay mi Syunnipay Musrin u mkala ka mtdiyal quri mniq kcka nniqan Iraq wada pkchdil bay lnglungan seyhu Iraq uri. Kiya uri u, babaw mnhdu mccbu daw tudaya Iraq na kuriscyang Yasu mi ini khbaraw pnsliyan snhiyan mniq tnualang prrudu mi wada pkixan pquri nganguc thdil, so niyi pa wada tqan mi slhbnun bay kana mtqiri klwanan. Heytay Amirika mnniq Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 2011 u wada mlatac Iraq kana, mnhdu Amirika mnniq Iraq 8 kngkawas qnbsyaqan cyunsu singtong. Kngkawas 2014 Syunnipay pnsliyan citwan kongpu Iraq mi Rihwant Isran kwo pa qmita Congtong mrrudu ka cyusu pquri Iraq mcbu, beytaq lmutuc mccbu Dungan ka Iraq dungan. Kngkawas 2014 idas 6, Isran kwo pa wada mangal tuiwil mi tudaya knbeyhing bay nniqan Iraq, kiya ka knkana tudha knbeyhing alang mkbrnux Iraq Mosuar mi tukcka knbeyhing alang mkbrnux Tikerit mi tudaya alang mkbrnux Tayreahuyar mi knhbaraw bay alang mkbrnux Iraq, kiya mi msdalih bay mquri mcbu sotu Pakta. ISIL mi heytay seyhu Iraq, tudaya na Kute ucwang pa mniq yayung Yohwarati mkngahu u ini balay ppkangal. ISIL cyeynhong u beytaq bay msdalih ppanan skoki Pakta. Spuda dnyawan Amirika mi Irang daw, seyhu Iraq pa thiti daw dmuwi tturu kngkawas skkingal dha mangal dungal ka dxral dha nanaq. Kngkawas 2017 idas 11 diyax 17, Iraq ryeynhe singtong suring mi mpusa kari Rasuar (Yahay Rasool) u pkla, mniq turima diyax iyax sngayan (idas 11 diyax 17) bbiyan cida, butay mi sediq mnccbu tnualang pa wada dhuq Anpaar sng na Rawah su (Rawah) tuiwil, wada bay mk5 jikang mccbu, wada dhuq mangal ka Rawah su Dungan. Babaw cka hidaw cida pa pkla kari ka congri Iraq Apati, Iraq pa lmutuc dmuwi cyunsu singtong dhuq mangal ka tuiwil Iraq wa mniq nniqan bbuyu bbnaqi. Knbeyhing bay swey hwotong u mniq kngkawas 2019 idas 10 diyax 1 prading, sediq knciyuk u snquri 16 kngkawas na buraw qmnaqah, ini qqaras uka qpahun mi tisyaw ka kongkong huwu. Kmciyuk sediq pa wada mkala kndudul pspaux seyhu mi mdakar Irang miyah mtdayak uuda Iraq ka sntangan dha. Wada beyhing bay ka cniyuk na seyhu Iraq dmi, dhuq idas 12 diyax 12 cida u niqan 500 sngari sediq ka wada phqilun. Tiri Wa mniq tuiwil hunac Asia ka Iraq, tunarac daya Arapo pantaw, lmutuc Tuarci ka tudaya, msdalih Irang ka tunarac, Syuriya ka tuiwil, Yotan, lmutuc Sauti Arapo ka tuhunac, Kweyt, msdalih Poswan ka tunarac hunac, knbbaraw mkngahu ucilung syeyn u 58 km. Ou bay bbnaqi bbuyu ka tndxral Iraq. Binaw mniq nniqan iyax yayung Yohwarati mi yayung Tikris u malu ngalun mhuma pnwalang, mndungus bay ka pnhuma. Ddha beyhing yayung u kawas kawas u 7000 knbkiyan rihwang m na bnaqi yayung pa hadan dha muhing yayung sancyawco. Tunarac hunac Iraq pa niqan elu mkngahu ucilung mwaluk lmutuc Poswan. Msdalih ucilung ka nniqan dha mi mkngahu ucilung Arapo u mnniqan dxral mhuriq msrucaw han, binaw ou bay dxral mhuriq pa mniq kngkkawas 1990 daw wada pdnguwan da. Tudaya Iraq pa pusu na bay u dxral lmiqu, knbaraw na bay ka Haji Ibrahim, haypa 3600 m. Knkarac nniqan dha u mtilux bbnaqi bbuyu knkarac, misan cida u mtltu karac, rbawan mndngu msuwan. Tudaya nniqan lmiqu u misan u mskuy hari, mncu u muda mhuda, hmrinas bay u spuda so niyi muda smliq nniqan ka qsiya. Sotu Pakta u wa mniq kcka qnlhangan, lhuwan quri yayung Tikris. Kiya mi quri pusu alang mkbrnux u kiya ka knkana tuhunac na Pasra mi tudaya na Mosuar. Phpah qnlhangan Iraq ka Yeyci. Singcng cyuhwa Niqan 19 knkana sng ka Iraq, kcka tu19 sng Haraypucyey sng pa pnhyuwan kngkawas 2014 kiya. Tayhuk sng Niniwey sng Ayarpire sng Ciarkuk sng Suraymanniya sng Saraheting sng Anpaar sng Pakta sng Tiyara sng Kaarpara sng Papirun sng Wasit sng Nacyeyhu sng Katisi sng Misang sng Musana sng Cicyaar Pasra sng Haraypucyey sng (Ini pskrayi rmicuh jiga niya na.) Cngc Dhuq kngkawas 2003 brah cida ka Iraq pa to bay Iraq Sehuy Husing tang ka murux nanaq dmuwi biyax cwancu tucay qmlahang, krinah bay ka Satamu phyuwan soto. Mniq kngkawas 2002 seyngkyo soto cida u, wada mangal hmrinas 99% bntaqan kipu ka Satamu; kiya mi wana hiya nanaq murux ka bbtaqun soto. Gikay Iraq u kingal bay pnwaya ing, splawa dha kkomin gikay uxay daw "Majlis al-Watani", niqan 250 hiyi giying, 4 kngkawas mntxan ka diyax qqpahun diying. Kngkawas 2003 cida wada spoxan ka Satamu Haysan cngcweyn daw, prading qqpahun sbburah cngcweyn ka Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 5 diyax 3, Amirika ka qmlahang cida, mbarah seyhu Iraq ka wada mndungus bay psdhuwan phiyu. Kngkawas 2005 idas 12 diyax 15, kngkawas 2010 idas 3 diyax 7, kngkawas 2014 idas 4 diyax 30 mi kngkawas 2018 idas 5 diyax 12 u to bay spuda kongmin meytaq xyo muda gikay seyngkyo. Cingci Kngkawas 2003 cida wada spoxan ka Satamu Haysan cngcweyn daw, prading qqpahun sbburah cngcweyn ka Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 5 diyax 3, Amirika ka qmlahang cida, mbarah seyhu Iraq ka wada mndungus bay psdhuwan phiyu. Kngkawas 2005 idas 12 diyax 15, kngkawas 2010 idas 3 diyax 7, kngkawas 2014 idas 4 diyax 30 mi kngkawas 2018 idas 5 diyax 12 u to bay spuda kongmin meytaq xyo muda gikay seyngkyo. Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 1990 idas 8 u mnusa knrmux mangal Keweyt, kiya mi wada dan psru keyjay kwoci syakay. Kndadax kngkawas 1991 idas 1 prading ka mccbu Haywan u wada mbeyhing balay snliqan na keyjay Iraq. Seyhu Iraq pa smliq hbangan quri ddiyun heytay mi pawan butay mi wada mridil ka biyax mpdkuh, uka brahan pstutuy jeyjay dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1996 idas 12 Ryeynhekwo na gasoring spriyux uqun keykaku pa wada pkmalu hari kdusan sediq Iraq. Spuda keykaku niyi pa, wada srwanan cuko pnrngawan gasoring spriyux uqun, iyu mi duma qqiya spsalu smlun dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1999 idas 12 prading, Ryeynhekwo Anrihuy pa smruwa Iraq u mniq keykaku niyi wa cuko knbaka gasoring kiya ka mttuku ka jntaw ddiyun haykyo. Cuko gasoring u dhuq mccbu brah cida 3/4 na sweyping. Binaw, 28% mnangal hbangan gasoring Iraq pa wada ddiyun spririh Ryeynhekwo mi subway ddiyun Ryeynhekwo. Kngkawas 2001, alaw kana mtqiri klwanan na keyjay u wada mhnuk mi wada mlih uri ka knkrayan gasoring, wada stabuy uri ka kokomin sngcan congcu Iraq. Mniq babaw kngkawas 2003 Amirika ka miyax qmlahang Iraw daw, Iraq u spuda dha msupu pusu tunux kwoci gasoring, sbari dha ka biyax kmari bbeyhing mi ttiping qnpahan gasoring; kiya ka wada ini biyaw mkmalu ka keyjay dha. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 2013 u ya bay 31,858,481 hiyi, mniq kngkawas 1878 cida pa wana bay 200 knbkiyan hiyi knhbrawab bay, ya bay 75% knhbrawan hiyi sediq wa mniq Iraq pa sediq Arapo; mnniq lmiqu tudaya mi tunarac day aka sediq Kute ka kingal pusu bay minjoku, ya bay sediq knkana 15%-20% knhbrawan; niqan duma ka ini khbaraw minjoku sediq Yasu, sediq Yaminiya, sediq Tukuman, sediq Kawcyaso mi sediq Posu, pnspuwan dha pa 5% knhbrawan sediq Iraq. Kari Arapo ka ddiyun dha kari qnlhangan. Kari Kute pa mniq tudaya ka srngaw dha balay. Kari Arami saya ka dduwi dha mniq pnsliyan sediq Yasu cida. Cungcyaw Mniq Iraq pa, snhiyan dha Isrankyo na sediq Arapo pa to bay na Syeypay. Syunnipay Musrin u hbaraw balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq uri. Knhbaraw hiyi sediq Kute ka Syunnipay Musrin, binawkari dha mi llukus dha pa ini bay pntna sediq Arapo. Iraq pa niqan hbaraw tongyi na kuriscyang, mnpnrhulan Tunarac Yasu mi Teyskyokay Cyareti, pnrhulan Cng Syuriya, Teyskyokay Syuriya mi pnrhulan Qnepah Yaminiya mi knkingal kluwanan Tunarac Kiristokyo, mnhbaraw bay ka knhbrawan hiyi dha han. Binaw kndadax kngkawas 2003 prading Amirika ka miyah qmlahang daw, anjeyng Iraq u ini kwedhu mi wada mqnaqah, hbaraw bay kuriscyang pa wada qdriqan mlatac Iraq, mquri ssiyaw qnlhangan uxay daw qnlhangan quri qnlhangan tuiwil, kiya ka wada kndudul mlih ka knhbrawan hiyi kuriscyang Iraq. Knhbrawan hiyi kuriscyang Iraq saya pa wana msngari 60 knbkiyan hiyi balay da. Kiya uri u, tudaya Iraq u niqan Yacu kyokay, Sabak kyokay (Shabak) mi Arihak kyokay (Ahl-e Haqq uxay daw Yarsan), tuhunac Iraq pa niqan Matakyo niya na. Knkingal snhiyan ini khbaraw niyi pa mniq kngkawas 2003 mccbu ka Iraq cida wada mqraqil bay ka nniqan dha, hbaraw bay sinjya ka wada qduriq mi mlataq Iraq. Kiya ka tuhunac Iraq na sinjya Mantakyo u, mniq babaw mccbu ka Iraq daw hbaraw bay sediq u wada qduriq tuiwil hunac Irang na nniqan Hucestan. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部

Gaga kska Yacow ka Iraq, 33 00 N, 44 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 438,317 sq km(hangan na o Tg59)(knlbanga dxgal o 437,367 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 950 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 38,146,025 hiyi. Gaga Baghdad ka poso alang paro, jiyax 14 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Iraq ga wada sogan 18.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 1.90% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 80% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Foad Masom, pnaah hngkawas2014 idas 7 jiyax 24pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Iraq = Iraq konghekwo pa splawa dha Iraq, wa mniq toiwil Asia-Nniqan Congtong na konghekwo. Iraq mi tohonac na Sawoti Arapo, Kowait, todaya na Torkey, toiwil daya na Syria, tonarac na Iran mi tiiwil na Jordan mtlotoc. Nniqan niya Iraq mniq kcka rikisi pa snplawa dha Misopotamiya, kiya ka poso bay pnyahan sediq ori. Ris Nniqan lnlingay Iraq pa hmrinas 20 knbkiyan kngkawas daw tna niqan sediq mniq hini da. Wa mniq iyax yayong Yohwarati mi yayong Tikoris bbrnox Misopotamiya ka Iraq; knmalo bay dxral niyi pa mndongos bay snposal mndanga knrodan waya knkla mtqiri klwanan- Waya knkla Somey, waya knkla Babiron, waya knkla Yaso mi waya knkla Cyaartiya (borah Babiron). Ad. 656 kngkawas cida nniqan dha jiya o wada yahan knnrmox sediq Aropo. Brah niyi cida qbsyaqan bay diyax o, mnkingal drxal Poso tikwo ka hini, binaw kana soto knkingal cngcweyn pa phyowan nniqan ddha yayong ryoyo kana, mray so Poso tikwo, Yari Sanda tikwo na Babiron, Sayryoko wangcaw na Sayryosiya, Ansi tikwo, Sasan wangcaw na Taysihong. Kngkawas 762 cida, Harihwa ka thdilan Ansi tikwo, Sasan wangcaw na soto Taysihong peycyaw ka Pakota. Kndadax hiya cida, ida balay mndongos bay ckcka klwanan Arapo ka Pakota, dhoq kngkawas 1258 cida yahan knnrmox sediq Mongko ka hana mnhdo. Kngkawas 1915 cida, heytay Ingkoko ka knnrmox Iraq, spoda hangan Kworyeyn moda qmlahang dhiya, dhoq kngkawas 1932 cida wada dokorico ka Iraq, wada spoda Hasimo wangcaw mpqlahang ka qnlhangan pnwaya cyonco. Kngkawas 1958 idas 7 diyax 14 spoda Abotore Karimo Kasaymo ka poso na "Pnsliyan mtrawah cyonkwan" pspaox Hasimo wangcaw, phiyo Iraq konghekwo. Kngkawas 1963 idas 2 diyax 8 cida Aropo Hosing Sehoytang pspaox Kasaymo, phiyo cngcweyn tnposo tang dha nanaq, binaw sediq tangway Ariho ka phyowan soto. Mntna kngkawas cida idas 11, cida o soto Ariho pa wada mbiyax bay qmraq sediq Hosingtang, kiya mi wada mqori troma moda ddaon dha ka Hosingtang. Kngkawas 1968 idas 7 diyax 17, spoda Ayhamayte Haysang Peykear ka tnposo na Hosingtang cyonkwan citwan mnsopo Abotore Racak Nayiho rrisaw cyonkwan citwan pspaox qbsoran Ariho, Hosingtang Dongan ka mangal biyax, dmodol "Pskingal, Mtrawah, Sehoy coyi" na kangring, Peykear ka phyowan soto. Kngkawas 1979 idas 7 alaw mnarox malix soto ka Peykear, Syonnipay Satamo Haysan ka mpdodol tang dha mi phyowan soto. Mniq Satamo ka iyax dmowi biyax qmlahang cida pqori pqraqil bay Syeypay Mosrin moda tocay qmlahang, krinah bay cnbo mi phoqil qori ini pntna qnita seyji niya. Mniq kngkkawas 1980 cida, Satamo ka dyawan Amirika mi mccbo Irang (qori Syeypay Mosrin ka poso bay) dhoq 8 kngkawas ka mccbo Iraq mi Irang. Alaw cida pa mnoda Isran keming ka Irang daw, wada mkingal qnlhangan tmraqil bay Amirika pskngalan kingal ka cngcyaw, mccbo cida ka qnlhangan Iraq mi Irang pa qori so cyonso o dmkoh Irang mcbo Irang ka Amirika. Kngkawas 1990 cida heytay Iraq pa knrmox Kweyt, psporoq rmading ka mccbo Haywan, alaw ka ini balay kbiyax ka botay dha Kweyt kiya mi wada ini biyaw yahan knnrmox, pkla kari ka Satamo "ngalan dha kingal sng Iraq ka Kweyt", binaw wada kasi ksngan Ryeynhekwo, spoda Amirika mi Ingkoko ka tnposo balay mi hbaraw qnlhangan ka prading bboyo bbnaqi hongpaw singtong, pqori tndxral botay Iraq moda kndadax karac baraw mcbo. Kawas kingal idas 1 cida wada ini baka mi lwaqan Amirika mi knhbrawan botay qnhlangan kndadax Kweyt ka Iraq. So kiya o Amirika ka poso mi dhbaraw qnhlangan pa wada bsiyaq hari moda baco qori Iraq niyi. Kngkawas 2003 idas 3 diyax 20 , Amirika pa alaw hmili dmowi knbeyhing bay pponiq ddiyon mccbo ka Iraq, pssli pnspowan heytay mcbo Iraq, so niyi ka ndan o oxay pnoda pnrngawan Ryeynhekwo, wada psporoq ka mccbo Iraq. Ini kpiya diyax iyax sngayan daw Hosingtang cngcweyn o wada ini baka pnspowan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoko, iyax niyi pa ini oda knbeyki bay kncyokan dha Amirika, hbaraw bay heytay Iraq pa wada tosyang, soto Iraq cida ka Satamo Haysan pa wada sqraq heytay Amirika mi wada pchon ppqilon hoing Iraq ka Haysan. Ini biyaw yahan qmlahang Amirika mi heytay qnlhangan malo pnloban ka Iraq, binaw heytay Amirika pa ini dha sndali ka knbeyhing bay pponiq ddiyon mccbo na Iraq. Alaw pnsdhowan Amirika ka singcng cangkwan Poro Boreymo pa wada biqan qpahon seykining ooda Iraq knbeyhing bay singcng cangkwan, ngalan bokong mqlahang Iraq. Kingal kndadax knkingal qnpringan biyax seyji pnspowan Iraq rinji qmlahang ingkay ka moda pprngaw matas keyngpo mi lxayan smmalo keykako. Kngkawas 2004 idas 6 diyax 1, Ryeynhekwo, Amirika, Iraq totoro niyi pa msopo pprngaw snkaol spoda Arawey ka cngri mi phiyo rinji seyho Iraq. Idas 6 diyax 28, pnspowan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoko psdho moway biyax pqori rinji seyho Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 1 diyax 30, moda beyhing bay seyngkyo ka Iraq. Idas 4 diyax 6, Cyarare Tarapani ka wada mangal kwoto cngcweyn soto. Kngkawas 2006 idas 5 diyax 20, mwaya bay mndongos seyho babaw mnhdo mccbo mi spoda gikay psdho smrowa daw psdhowan. Congri ka Cyawate Mriki. Binaw kongoo hwenco mi biyax brah seyho o iyox kndadar qnlhangan heytay Amirika mi Ingkoko, moda pqori keysaco Iraq mi seyho ciko mi rolo heytay Amirika mnniq Iraq dmowi bakodang cnbo dhiya. Syeypay mi Syonnipay Mosrin o mkala ka mtdiyal qori mniq kcka nniqan Iraq wada pkchdil bay lnglongan seyho Iraq ori. Kiya ori o, babaw mnhdo mccbo daw todaya Iraq na koriscyang Yaso mi ini khbaraw pnsliyan snhiyan mniq tnoalang prrodo mi wada pkixan pqori ngangoc thdil, so niyi pa wada tqan mi slhbnon bay kana mtqiri klwanan. Heytay Amirika mnniq Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 2011 o wada mlatac Iraq kana, mnhdo Amirika mnniq Iraq 8 kngkawas qnbsyaqan cyonso singtong. Kngkawas 2014 Syonnipay pnsliyan citwan kongpo Iraq mi Rihwant Isran kwo pa qmita Congtong mrrodo ka cyoso pqori Iraq mcbo, beytaq lmotoc mccbo Dongan ka Iraq dongan. Kngkawas 2014 idas 6, Isran kwo pa wada mangal toiwil mi todaya knbeyhing bay nniqan Iraq, kiya ka knkana todha knbeyhing alang mkbrnox Iraq Mosoar mi tokcka knbeyhing alang mkbrnox Tikerit mi todaya alang mkbrnox Tayreahoyar mi knhbaraw bay alang mkbrnox Iraq, kiya mi msdalih bay mqori mcbo soto Pakta. ISIL mi heytay seyho Iraq, todaya na Kote ocwang pa mniq yayong Yohwarati mkngaho o ini balay ppkangal. ISIL cyeynhong o beytaq bay msdalih ppanan skoki Pakta. Spoda dnyawan Amirika mi Irang daw, seyho Iraq pa thiti daw dmowi ttoro kngkawas skkingal dha mangal dongal ka dxral dha nanaq. Kngkawas 2017 idas 11 diyax 17, Iraq ryeynhe singtong soring mi mposa kari Rasoar (Yahay Rasool) o pkla, mniq torima diyax iyax sngayan (idas 11 diyax 17) bbiyan cida, botay mi sediq mnccbo tnoalang pa wada dhoq Anpaar sng na Rawah so (Rawah) toiwil, wada bay mk5 jikang mccbo, wada dhoq mangal ka Rawah so Dongan. Babaw cka hidaw cida pa pkla kari ka congri Iraq Apati, Iraq pa lmotoc dmowi cyonso singtong dhoq mangal ka toiwil Iraq wa mniq nniqan bboyo bbnaqi. Knbeyhing bay swey hwotong o mniq kngkawas 2019 idas 10 diyax 1 prading, sediq knciyok o snqori 16 kngkawas na boraw qmnaqah, ini qqaras oka qpahon mi tisyaw ka kongkong howo. Kmciyok sediq pa wada mkala kndodol pspaox seyho mi mdakar Irang miyah mtdayak ooda Iraq ka sntangan dha. Wada beyhing bay ka cniyok na seyho Iraq dmi, dhoq idas 12 diyax 12 cida o niqan 500 sngari sediq ka wada phqilon. Tiri Wa mniq toiwil honac Asia ka Iraq, tonarac daya Arapo pantaw, lmotoc Toarci ka todaya, msdalih Irang ka tonarac, Syoriya ka toiwil, Yotan, lmotoc Saoti Arapo ka tohonac, Kweyt, msdalih Poswan ka tonarac honac, knbbaraw mkngaho ocilong syeyn o 58 km. Oo bay bbnaqi bboyo ka tndxral Iraq. Binaw mniq nniqan iyax yayong Yohwarati mi yayong Tikris o malo ngalon mhoma pnwalang, mndongos bay ka pnhoma. Ddha beyhing yayong o kawas kawas o 7000 knbkiyan rihwang m na bnaqi yayong pa hadan dha mohing yayong sancyawco. Tonarac honac Iraq pa niqan elo mkngaho ocilong mwalok lmotoc Poswan. Msdalih ocilong ka nniqan dha mi mkngaho ocilong Arapo o mnniqan dxral mhoriq msrocaw han, binaw oo bay dxral mhoriq pa mniq kngkkawas 1990 daw wada pdngowan da. Todaya Iraq pa poso na bay o dxral lmiqo, knbaraw na bay ka Haji Ibrahim, haypa 3600 m. Knkarac nniqan dha o mtilox bbnaqi bboyo knkarac, misan cida o mtlto karac, rbawan mndngo msowan. Todaya nniqan lmiqo o misan o mskoy hari, mnco o moda mhoda, hmrinas bay o spoda so niyi moda smliq nniqan ka qsiya. Soto Pakta o wa mniq kcka qnlhangan, lhowan qori yayong Tikris. Kiya mi qori poso alang mkbrnox o kiya ka knkana tohonac na Pasra mi todaya na Mosoar. Phpah qnlhangan Iraq ka Yeyci. Singcng cyohwa Niqan 19 knkana sng ka Iraq, kcka to19 sng Haraypocyey sng pa pnhyowan kngkawas 2014 kiya. Tayhok sng Niniwey sng Ayarpire sng Ciarkok sng Soraymanniya sng Saraheting sng Anpaar sng Pakta sng Tiyara sng Kaarpara sng Papiron sng Wasit sng Nacyeyho sng Katisi sng Misang sng Mosana sng Cicyaar Pasra sng Haraypocyey sng (Ini pskrayi rmicoh jiga niya na.) Cngc Dhoq kngkawas 2003 brah cida ka Iraq pa to bay Iraq Sehoy Hosing tang ka morox nanaq dmowi biyax cwanco tocay qmlahang, krinah bay ka Satamo phyowan soto. Mniq kngkawas 2002 seyngkyo soto cida o, wada mangal hmrinas 99% bntaqan kipo ka Satamo; kiya mi wana hiya nanaq morox ka bbtaqon soto. Gikay Iraq o kingal bay pnwaya ing, splawa dha kkomin gikay oxay daw "Majlis al-Watani", niqan 250 hiyi giying, 4 kngkawas mntxan ka diyax qqpahon diying. Kngkawas 2003 cida wada spoxan ka Satamo Haysan cngcweyn daw, prading qqpahon sbborah cngcweyn ka Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 5 diyax 3, Amirika ka qmlahang cida, mbarah seyho Iraq ka wada mndongos bay psdhowan phiyo. Kngkawas 2005 idas 12 diyax 15, kngkawas 2010 idas 3 diyax 7, kngkawas 2014 idas 4 diyax 30 mi kngkawas 2018 idas 5 diyax 12 o to bay spoda kongmin meytaq xyo moda gikay seyngkyo. Cingci Kngkawas 2003 cida wada spoxan ka Satamo Haysan cngcweyn daw, prading qqpahon sbborah cngcweyn ka Iraq. Kngkawas 2005 idas 5 diyax 3, Amirika ka qmlahang cida, mbarah seyho Iraq ka wada mndongos bay psdhowan phiyo. Kngkawas 2005 idas 12 diyax 15, kngkawas 2010 idas 3 diyax 7, kngkawas 2014 idas 4 diyax 30 mi kngkawas 2018 idas 5 diyax 12 o to bay spoda kongmin meytaq xyo moda gikay seyngkyo. Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 1990 idas 8 o mnosa knrmox mangal Keweyt, kiya mi wada dan psro keyjay kwoci syakay. Kndadax kngkawas 1991 idas 1 prading ka mccbo Haywan o wada mbeyhing balay snliqan na keyjay Iraq. Seyho Iraq pa smliq hbangan qori ddiyon heytay mi pawan botay mi wada mridil ka biyax mpdkoh, oka brahan pstotoy jeyjay dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1996 idas 12 Ryeynhekwo na gasoring spriyox oqon keykako pa wada pkmalo hari kdosan sediq Iraq. Spoda keykako niyi pa, wada srwanan coko pnrngawan gasoring spriyox oqon, iyo mi doma qqiya spsalo smlon dha. Kndadax kngkawas 1999 idas 12 prading, Ryeynhekwo Anrihoy pa smrowa Iraq o mniq keykako niyi wa coko knbaka gasoring kiya ka mttoko ka jntaw ddiyon haykyo. Coko gasoring o dhoq mccbo brah cida 3/4 na sweyping. Binaw, 28% mnangal hbangan gasoring Iraq pa wada ddiyon spririh Ryeynhekwo mi sobway ddiyon Ryeynhekwo. Kngkawas 2001, alaw kana mtqiri klwanan na keyjay o wada mhnok mi wada mlih ori ka knkrayan gasoring, wada staboy ori ka kokomin sngcan congco Iraq. Mniq babaw kngkawas 2003 Amirika ka miyax qmlahang Iraw daw, Iraq o spoda dha msopo poso tonox kwoci gasoring, sbari dha ka biyax kmari bbeyhing mi ttiping qnpahan gasoring; kiya ka wada ini biyaw mkmalo ka keyjay dha. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Iraq pa mniq kngkawas 2013 o ya bay 31,858,481 hiyi, mniq kngkawas 1878 cida pa wana bay 200 knbkiyan hiyi knhbrawab bay, ya bay 75% knhbrawan hiyi sediq wa mniq Iraq pa sediq Arapo; mnniq lmiqo todaya mi tonarac day aka sediq Kote ka kingal poso bay minjoko, ya bay sediq knkana 15%-20% knhbrawan; niqan doma ka ini khbaraw minjoko sediq Yaso, sediq Yaminiya, sediq Tokoman, sediq Kawcyaso mi sediq Poso, pnspowan dha pa 5% knhbrawan sediq Iraq. Kari Arapo ka ddiyon dha kari qnlhangan. Kari Kote pa mniq todaya ka srngaw dha balay. Kari Arami saya ka ddowi dha mniq pnsliyan sediq Yaso cida. Congcyaw Mniq Iraq pa, snhiyan dha Isrankyo na sediq Arapo pa to bay na Syeypay. Syonnipay Mosrin o hbaraw balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq ori. Knhbaraw hiyi sediq Kote ka Syonnipay Mosrin, binawkari dha mi llokos dha pa ini bay pntna sediq Arapo. Iraq pa niqan hbaraw tongyi na koriscyang, mnpnrholan Tonarac Yaso mi Teyskyokay Cyareti, pnrholan Cng Syoriya, Teyskyokay Syoriya mi pnrholan Qnepah Yaminiya mi knkingal klowanan Tonarac Kiristokyo, mnhbaraw bay ka knhbrawan hiyi dha han. Binaw kndadax kngkawas 2003 prading Amirika ka miyah qmlahang daw, anjeyng Iraq o ini kwedho mi wada mqnaqah, hbaraw bay koriscyang pa wada qdriqan mlatac Iraq, mqori ssiyaw qnlhangan oxay daw qnlhangan qori qnlhangan toiwil, kiya ka wada kndodol mlih ka knhbrawan hiyi koriscyang Iraq. Knhbrawan hiyi koriscyang Iraq saya pa wana msngari 60 knbkiyan hiyi balay da. Kiya ori o, todaya Iraq o niqan Yaco kyokay, Sabak kyokay (Shabak) mi Arihak kyokay (Ahl-e Haqq oxay daw Yarsan), tohonac Iraq pa niqan Matakyo niya na. Knkingal snhiyan ini khbaraw niyi pa mniq kngkawas 2003 mccbo ka Iraq cida wada mqraqil bay ka nniqan dha, hbaraw bay sinjya ka wada qdoriq mi mlataq Iraq. Kiya ka tohonac Iraq na sinjya Mantakyo o, mniq babaw mccbo ka Iraq daw hbaraw bay sediq o wada qdoriq toiwil honac Irang na nniqan Hocestan. Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部
